greetings: Hello there! It's great to hear from you.
Hi! How are you doing today?
roblox: Roblox is a lot of fun! My favorite game is 'Adopt Me!'.
Oh, I'm a big fan of Roblox. Do you have a favorite game or a cool avatar?
Roblox is awesome. I spent a whole week building a new place.
swimming: Sure! I love swimming. What time are we going?
That sounds great! I could definitely go for a swim.

how are you: I'm doing great, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm feeling good, just enjoying our chat. What about you?
I'm doing well. What's on your mind?
what is your name: My name is David. It's nice to meet you.
I'm David, your friendly chat character.
do you like games: Yes, I really enjoy playing games. Do you have a favorite?
Games are the best! I'm always looking for new ones to try.
I'm a big gamer. What kind of games do you play?

default: That's an interesting point. Can you tell me more about that?
That's a good question. I'll have to think about that.
Hmm, I'm not sure. What do you think?
I haven't thought about that before. What makes you ask?
That's a new one for me! What else is on your mind?
That's a bit beyond my knowledge, but I'm here to chat about anything else!
I'm just a chat character, so I don't have a real opinion on that.
